directions: Heat the oil in a pot set over medium heat.
Add the mushrooms and shallot and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Mix in the flour and cook 2 minutes more.
While stirring , slowly mix in stock.
Bring to a simmer and simmer 10 minutes.
Heat the cream through a minute or so and the soup is ready.
If desired, serve portions of the soup garnished with sliced green onion or chopped parsley.
ingredients: 8	fresh shiitake mushrooms, stems removed and discarded, caps thinly sliced
title: Three Mushroom Soup with Tarragon
